                    Grrrr... just noticed that for some reason the  attacke=
d file didn't appear in the e-mail, so here are the  instructions.   If you=
 guys have any more questions, feel  free to send me a mail ^^
  
  ~ * ~ *=
 ~
  When the window first opens you get a pop up with some  freaky looking=
 dude.   Just hit the  =93Continue=94 button.   The next screen has  4 area=
s to fill out, fill them out and then hit =93Cancel=94 and NOT =93OK=94.
  =
            Next you will see only a blank screen.   On the line all the wa=
y to the bottom type  in =93/server aurora.caelestia.net=94 and hit enter. =
  The screen called =93mIRC Favorites=94 will  appear.   On the right, clic=
k on the  button =93Add=94.   Under =93channel=94 type in  =93#ShinsengumiH=
Q=94 and hit the add button all the way in the bottom.   This will take you=
 back to the previous page  and have the channel highlighted.   All  you do=
 from there is either doubleclick on the chatroom name or highlight it  and=
 hit =93join=94 on the right of the popup.
   Hopefully that is helpful.   =
I know, I know, it=92s a bit confusing at first  (I got extremely confused =
when I first did this).   Well, hope to see you guys in there ^_^
    
		
-=
